templateOptions.label: CSV File Path
templateOptions.description: The path to the CSV file to export the data to

templateOptions.label: Delimiter
templateOptions.description: The delimiter that separates the property values in the CSV file. The default is a comma (,)

templateOptions.label: Encoding
templateOptions.description: The encoding for the imported CSV file. The default value is utf8

templateOptions.label: Toggle debug logging
templateOptions.description: When toggled, debug logging will be displayed
